{"city": "Oakley", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "971 O'Hara Avenue,", "phone": "925-783-0818", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Oakley Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. The Commons at Oakley , 69 Carol Ln, Oakley , 2nd & 4th Tuesday 2:00-3:00pm.
							Please head inside the complex and turn right. At the second stop sign turn left. Please bring two bags with handles. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Oakley Senior Center , 971 O'Hara Avenue, Oakley , Thursday 1:00-2:00pm – open until all food is given out.
							Oakley Senior Center has moved out of their previous location. For the foreseeable future they will be operating out of St. Anthony's Church at 971 O'Hara Avenue, Oakley. Please bring your own bags/containers. Please do not arrive at the location before 11:00 am. Doors will open at 1:00 pm. Phone: 925-783-0818 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Anthony's Catholic Church , 971 O'Hara Ave, Oakley , 2nd & 4th Saturday 9:00-10:00am. Phone: 925-325-7424 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Partner Soup Kitchen Soup kitchens provide FREE meals to anyone who comes in during meal hours. Menus vary, although each soup kitchen tries to offer balanced meals. Loaves & Fishes (Redman-Pocahontas Hall) , 1403 Main St, Oakley , Monday-Friday 11:00am-12:45pm. Phone: 925-293-4792 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). St. Anthony's Catholic Church , 971 O'Hara Ave, Oakley , 2nd & 4th Thursday 9:00-10:30am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
